name.th: ฮีลิกซ์ จัมป์

short.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play Helix Jump as a Chrome extension - Try it now!
short.bg: Играйте Helix Jump като разширение на Chrome - Опитайте го сега!
short.el,he: ¡Juega Helix Jump como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.es: ¡Juega a Helix Jump como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ya!
short.et: Mängi Helix Jumpi Chrome'i laiendusena - proovi kohe!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Helix Jump bilang isang Chrome extension - Subukan mo na ngayon!
short.hr: Igrajte Helix Jump kao Chrome produžetak - Isprobajte sada!
short.hu: Játssz a Helix Jump játékkal Chrome bővítményként - Próbáld ki most!
short.it: Gioca a Helix Jump come estensione per Chrome - Provalo ora!
short.ja: ヘリックスジャンプをChrome拡張機能としてプレイしてみてください！
short.lt: Žaiskite „Helix Jump“ kaip „Chrome“ plėtinį - Išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlējiet Helix Jump kā Chrome paplašinājumu - Izmēģiniet tagad!
short.ms: Mainkan Helix Jump sebagai sambungan Chrome - Cuba sekarang!
short.nl: Speel Helix Jump als een Chrome-extensie - Probeer het nu!
short.no: ¡Juega a Helix Jump como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.ru: Играйте в Helix Jump как расширение для Chrome - Попробуйте сейчас!
short.sl: Igrajte Helix Jump kot razširitev za Chrome - Poskusite zdaj!
short.sr: Играјте Helix Jump као Chrome додатак - Покушајте сада!
short.th: เล่น Helix Jump เป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - ลองเลย!
short.tr: Helix Jump'u bir Chrome eklentisi olarak oyna - Şimdi deneyin!
short.vi: Chơi Helix Jump như một tiện ích mở rộng trên Chrome - Hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 在 Chrome 扩展中玩 Helix Jump - 现在试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 播放Helix Jump作為Chrome擴展功能-現在試試看！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Helix Jump" Chrome extension – the ultimate boredom buster and addictive game, now available right in your browser! 🌀

Helix Jump brings the excitement of the popular mobile game to your Chrome browser, offering endless fun and challenge with just a click away. Plunge into a vibrant world of twisting platforms, strategically navigate the bouncing ball through the labyrinthine structures, and aim to conquer each level with precision and speed. 🎯

With its sleek design and intuitive controls, Helix Jump is perfect for quick gaming sessions during work breaks or whenever you need a mental refresh. Challenge your reflexes, test your agility, and see how far you can descend without hitting obstacles. It's a test of skill, patience, and determination!

Whether you're a casual gamer looking for a quick dose of entertainment or a seasoned player seeking a new twist on classic gameplay, Helix Jump Chrome extension promises hours of addictive fun. So, why wait? Dive into the spiral adventure now and unleash your inner gaming champion! 🚀
